name: COLOR SMASH (LeonWard)
description:
The following game is a steady wave attack game with special game mechanic and play style that fits with the them of the jam "opposite". You will need to "Color Smash" the in coming waves of astro minions, only to quickly find out your initial "inputs" are not what they seem. Its a puzzle to figure out but if your witty enough you'll figure it out. 

Being that it is my first game ever created and my first publish I whish I could have added more mechanics and features that would have made it easier and fun for the player. I have coded, designed, and came up with this little concept to the best of my abilities being an individual dev. Current state its a steady one shot game. I hope you enjoy and definitely look forward to your advice and input. Thank you for playing my game.
